list.name: Changes
list.comment: ECOM-101 | test commit for integration check

change.afterPath: $PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/01_completness_check/r1_order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date, and order_status _ not_null
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/02_data_type_validation/r1_review_date must be valid timestamps
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/02_data_type_validation/r2_quantity_should be non-negative integers
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/02_data_type_validation/r3_rating in Customer Reviews must be an integer between 1 and 5
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/02_data_type_validation/r4_products_price should always be a decimal greater than zero
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/03_Uniqueness_Constraint/r1_order_id in Orders Table must be unique
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/03_Uniqueness_Constraint/r2_customer_id in Customers Table should not have duplicate
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/03_Uniqueness_Constraint/r3_product_id in Products Table should be distinct
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/04_referential_integrity/r1_customer_file_Each customer_id in Orders Table should exist in Customers Table
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/04_referential_integrity/r1_orders_file_Each customer_id in Orders Table should exist in Customers Table
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/05_Business_Rule_Validation/r1_order_status should be one of Pending Shipped Delivered Cancelled
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/05_Business_Rule_Validation/r2_availability_status in Product Catalog should be one of In Stock Out of Stock Pre-Order
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/05_Business_Rule_Validation/r4_phone_number should contain only numeric values with valid length
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/06_Timestamp_Validation_and_Order_Sequence_Consistency/r1_order_date should not be greater than the current timestamp

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/06_Timestamp_Validation_and_Order_Sequence_Consistency/r2_order_file_review_date in Customer Reviews should be after the corresponding order_date of the produc

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/06_Timestamp_Validation_and_Order_Sequence_Consistency/r2_review_file_review_date in Customer Reviews should be after the corresponding order_date of the product
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/06_Timestamp_Validation_and_Order_Sequence_Consistency/r3_If an order has multiple records should be in an increasing sequence

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/07_Anomaly_Detection_for_Sudden_Spikes_in_Data/r1_If the average order quantity is normally 1-10 items per order, but an order suddenly has 1000+ items, flag it for manual review
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/07_Anomaly_Detection_for_Sudden_Spikes_in_Data/r2_If price in Products Table changes by more than 50% in a single day, send an alert
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/07_Anomaly_Detection_for_Sudden_Spikes_in_Data/r3_If a sudden influx of new customers is detected trigger an anomaly check
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/08_Data_Drift_and_Schema_Evolution_Checks/r1_If a new column appears in the Product Catalog file, it should be logged and reviewed before processing
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/08_Data_Drift_and_Schema_Evolution_Checks/r2_Check for missing columns in incoming reviews files and abort ingestion if critical fields are absen
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/09_Duplicate_and_Late_Arriving_Data_Handling/r1_If two records with the same order_id exist in the same batch retain only the latest record
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/09_Duplicate_and_Late_Arriving_Data_Handling/r2_If an order update arrives 5+ days after the original order, log it as late-arriving data
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/09_Duplicate_and_Late_Arriving_Data_Handling/r3_rv1_Deduplicate Customer Reviews if the same review_id is seen in multiple files
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/09_Duplicate_and_Late_Arriving_Data_Handling/r3_rv2_Deduplicate Customer Reviews if the same review_id is seen in multiple files

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/10_Cross-Table-Business-Validation-Rules/r1_order_file_If order_status eq Shipped then quantity in the Orders Table should be ge stock_quantity in the Products Table

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/10_Cross-Table-Business-Validation-Rules/r1_product_file_If order_status eq Shipped then quantity in the Orders Table should be ge stock_quantity in the Products Table
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/10_Cross-Table-Business-Validation-Rules/r2_order_file_If a product_id exists in Orders Table, it must also be present in Product Catalog
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/10_Cross-Table-Business-Validation-Rules/r2_product_file_If a product_id exists in Orders Table it must also be present in Product Catalog

$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/11_Historical_Data_Integrity_and_SCD_Handling/r1_If a customer's address or email changes, insert a new record with an effective_date and mark the previous record as inactive
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/11_Historical_Data_Integrity_and_SCD_Handling/r2_If a product's price or category changes, retain historical versions instead of overwriting
$PROJECT_DIR$/data/dq_rules_sample_datasets/13_Outlier_Detection_and_Fraudulent_Transactions/r2_If a single customer_id submits gt 50 reviews in a day mark for review
